info.description: This is the API documentation for KetukApps backend service.
info.title: KetukApps API

get.description: Get all event logs for a specific ticket
Get all event logs created by a specific user
Handle callback from Google OAuth and authenticate user
Redirects user to Google OAuth consent screen

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information

post.description: Get a new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get a list of all item categories
Get an item category by its ID

put.description: Update item category information by ID. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Delete an item category by ID

get.description: Get a list of all items
Get all items for a specific category
Get an item by its ID

put.description: Update item information by ID. All fields are optional.

parameters.description: Updated item data (name, year, kondisi, note, categoryId)
parameters.name: updates

get.description: Get a list of all regular schedules
Get all regular schedules for a specific user
get.summary: Get regular schedules by user ID

get.description: Get a regular schedule by its ID

put.description: Update regular schedule information by ID. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Delete a regular schedule by ID

get.description: Get a list of all schedule tickets
Get all schedule tickets with a specific category
Get all schedule tickets for a specific user
get.summary: Get schedule tickets by user ID

get.description: Get a schedule ticket by its ID

put.description: Update schedule ticket information by ID. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Delete a schedule ticket by ID

get.description: Get a list of all tickets

post.description: Create a new ticket for a user

get.description: Get a ticket by its ID

patch.description: Update the status of a ticket

get.description: Get a list of all unblocking requests

post.description: Create a new unblocking request for semester unblocking

get.description: Get all unblocking requests for a specific user
get.summary: Get unblocking requests by user ID

get.description: Get an unblocking request by its ID
Get a list of all users

post.description: Create a new user with name and email

get.description: Get a user by their ID
Check if the API is running

models.CreateTicketRequest.description: Request body for creating a new ticket

description.example: Need to book conference room for meeting

models.CreateUserRequest.description: Request body for creating a new user

models.RefreshTokenRequest.description: Request body for refreshing access token

description.example: Need to book conference room for meeting

models.TicketEventLog.description: Ticket event log for audit trail

models.UpdateTicketRequest.description: Request body for updating a ticket

models.UpdateUserRequest.description: Request body for updating user information

google_sub.description: GoogleSub is kept for backwards compatibility with existing data

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
